name: Home Coin
description: HomeCoin is a new deflationary charity token focused on homelessness HomeCoin is a deflationary, community-driven and liquidity generating protocol on the BSC network with a focus on helping people that lack basic human necessities through initiatives and donations. The HomeCoin team has a lot of empathy for those who struggle in their daily lives and have set their sight on fighting homelessness and other issues through the power of crypto.
